title: Chess
description: I enjoy playing competitive chess online on sites like chess.com. (Check out my profile at https://www.chess.com/member/sidsun1!) I'm hovering around a 2000 ELO rating and am always looking to improve upon my theory and quick thinking. I mainly play speed-chess modes like bullet and blitz at the moment.

title: Hiking and Traveling
description: I love exploring trails and mountains to disconnect from tech and reconnect with nature. I've been to many national parks around the US as well as half the states, always experiencing something awesome.

title: Playing the Piano
description: Playing songs on the piano from movie soundtracks to classical pieces for over 5 years has taught me the importance of patience and learning how exactly to learn. While I don't have much time to practice nowadays, I hope to reconnect with this hobby soon!
